omatsivut.title: Applications and accepting an offer of admission
omatsivut.subtitle: Follow your admission process. You do not need to register or log in in order to apply.
omatsivut.label: On applications page you can:
omatsivut.item1: view your applications and make modifications to them during application period
omatsivut.item2: see the results of student admissions
omatsivut.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

koski.title: My completed studies (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
koski.subtitle: View and share information about your studies
koski.label: Study information available:
koski.item1: Basic education and secondary education from 2018 onwards
koski.item3: Higher education from 1995 onwards (varies by higher education institution)
koski.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

valpas.title: TODO-EN Oppivelvollisuuden suorittamisen seurantapalvelu Valpas
valpas.subtitle: TODO-EN Katsele oppivelvollisuuden seurantapalveluun tallennettuja tietoja.
valpas.icon: TODO-EN Ikoni kahdesta paperiarkista osin limittäin
valpas.label: TODO-EN Voit tarkastella:
valpas.item1: TODO-EN huollettavasi oppivelvollisuuden suorittamiseen liittyviä tietoja
valpas.item2: TODO-EN omia oppivelvollisuuden suorittamiseen liittyviä tietojasi
valpas.item3: TODO-EN jotain muuta, käyttöliittymä haluaa kolmannen bulletin
valpas.linkUsingValtuudet: TODO-EN Voit siirtyä palveluun kirjauduttuasi ulos valtuuksia käyttävästä palvelusta.

varda.title: The national data warehouse for early childhood education and care Varda (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
varda.subtitle: View information stored in Varda, the national data warehouse on early childhood education and care.
varda.label: You can view the following information about you and your child:
varda.item1: early childhood education and care data about your child
varda.item2: your own fees on early childhood education and care
varda.item3: your employment data if you work in early childhood education and care
varda.link: Proceed to view information stored in Varda
varda.linkLoggedOut: Proceed to view information stored in Varda (requires identification)
varda.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

ehoks.title: eHOKS - Personal Competence Development Plan (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
ehoks.subtitle: eHOKS is a service for planning professional studies. The Personal Competence Development Plan is a practical tool for students, teachers in vocational schools and tutors in  workplaces.
ehoks.label: The service is available for:
ehoks.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.
